Sentencas: The detailed synthesis/design optimization of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) power plant is presented in this paper.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: In the first part of the paper, the bulk-flow model used to simulate the plant is discussed.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The performance of the centrifugal compressors and radial turbine is determined using maps, properly scaled in order to match the values required for mass flow rate and pressure ratio.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Compact heat exchangers are simulated using Colburn and friction factor correlations.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: For the SOFC, the cell voltage versus current density curves (i.e. polarization curves) are generated on the basis of the Nernst potential and overvoltages.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Validation of the SOFC polarization curves is accomplished with data available from Siemens Westinghouse.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Both the steam-methane pre-reforming and internal reforming processes are modeled assuming the water-gas shift reaction to be equilibrium-controlled and the demethanization reactions to be kinetically controlled.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Finally, a thermoeconomic model is developed by introducing capital cost functions for each plant component.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The whole plant is first simulated for a fixed configuration.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Then, a synthesis/design optimization of the plant is carried out using a traditional single-level approach.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The results of the optimization are presented and discussed.
Titulo: Single-level optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant
